mapper.select: SELECT D.NAME AS name, D.D_TYPE AS dType, T.TABLE_ID AS tableId, T.TABLE_NUMBER AS tableNumber, T.MAX_CAPACITY AS maxCapacity, T.MIN_CAPACITY AS minCapacity, T.ZONE_NAME AS zoneName, T.IS_SPECIFIABLE AS isSpecifiable, T.ACTIVE_YN AS activeYn FROM tbl_dining D INNER JOIN dining_tables T ON D.dining_id = T.FK_HOTEL_ID ORDER BY D.dining_id, T.TABLE_ID
